education.degree: Bachelor of Applied Science in Software Engineering
education.description: I continued my studies to higher education at the IPB University Vocational School, taking the Software Engineering Technology study program to develop my skills in the field of software development.
achievements: Finalist of the BMC Competition X-Project 9.0 (National Level)

achievements: 2nd highest average final report card grade.
Passed the final computer network competency test.
